# list_all_areas { #py_mealdb.MealDB.list_all_areas }

```python
MealDB.list_all_areas()
```

Retrieves all available geographical areas/cuisines.

| Name   | Type     | Description                                          |
|--------|----------|------------------------------------------------------|
|        | AreaList | AreaList object containing all available area names. |
